oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Merle Travis and the Hank Thompson Show - 1951-04-01
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Tape features multiple recordings. Firstly, a studio recording of Merle Travis playing the guitar. Secondly, a studio recording of Hank Thompson. The recordings are from an unknown date and April 01, 1951 respectfully.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Merle Travis; Hank Thompson
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Walking the Strings (Merle Travis) -- (01:44) Saturday Night Shuffle (Merle Travis) -- (03:56) Cannonball Rag (Merle Travis) -- (05:23) Blue Smoke (Hank Thompson and Merle Travis) -- (07:23) I Can't Go on This Way [at 09:23 song repeats] (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (09:50) I Can't Go on This Way [false start] (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (10:09) I Can't Go on This Way (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (12:21) What are We Gonna Do About the Moonlight [at 13:56 song repeats] (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (15:02) What are We Gonna Do About the Moonlight [incomplete] (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (15:08) What are We Gonna Do About the Moonlight [at 16:57 song repeats] (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (17:51) What are We Gonna Do About the Moonlight (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (20:34) California Women (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (23:16) California Women (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Travis, Merle; Travis, Merle, 1917-1983; Thompson, Hank;
